law.catch_line: The Commission shall reinstate the certificate of a real estate appraiser who has failed to renew th...
law.text:
The Commission shall reinstate the certificate of a real estate appraiser who has failed to renew the certificate during the regular term of the certificate or the grace period, if the real estate appraiser:
applies to the Commission for reinstatement within 2 years after the certificate expires;
meets the requirements of § 16-511 of this subtitle; and
in addition to the renewal fee required under § 16-511 of this subtitle, pays to the Commission a reinstatement fee set by the Commission.
